original_text: Yet they did not listen to their judges, for they whored after other gods and bowed down to them. They soon turned aside from the way in which their fathers had walked, who had obeyed the commandments of the Lord, and they did not do so.
korean_text: 그들이 그 사사들에게도 순종하지 아니하고 오히려 다른 신들을 따라가 음행하며 그들에게 절하고 여호와의 명령을 순종하던 그들의 조상들이 행하던 길에서 속히 치우쳐 떠나서 그와 같이 행하지 아니하였더라

sentences.original_text: Yet they did not listen to their judges
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그들은 자기 재판관들의 말을 듣지 않았으니

sentences.original_text: for they whored after other gods
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그들이 다른 신들을 따라 행음하며

sentences.original_text: They soon turned aside from the way
in which their fathers had walked
who had obeyed the commandments of the Lord
and they did not do so
